example.text: The legislation prohibits the Secretary of Energy from sending petroleum products from the SPR to China or any entity that intends to export it to China. President Biden raided the Strategic Petroleum Reserve to try and disguise the consequences of his anti-American energy agenda.

Taxpayers are on the hook for up to $400 billion in fraudulent unemployment insurance, which purpose was for people displaced by the pandemic. Yesterday, [[user]] passed a bipartisan bill to protect taxpayer dollars & recover potentially billions of stolen UI benefits.
[[user]] took action to restore operational control of the southern border and preserve the American dream by passing HR 2 today.? [[url]]

The bill is focused on restoring US energy independence by preventing abuse of the SPR and requiring the White House to put forth a plan to increase domestic production. The Strategic Petroleum Reserve exists for emergency situations-not disastrous Democrat policies.
